title: Partial Identification of Binary Choice Models with Misreported Outcomes. (arXiv:2401.17137v1 [econ.EM])
abstract: This paper provides partial identification of various binary choice models with misreported dependent variables. We propose two distinct approaches by exploiting different instrumental variables respectively. In the first approach, the instrument is assumed to only affect the true dependent variable but not misreporting probabilities. The second approach uses an instrument that influences misreporting probabilities monotonically while having no effect on the true dependent variable. Moreover, we derive identification results under additional restrictions on misreporting, including bounded/monotone misreporting probabilities. We use simulations to demonstrate the robust performance of our approaches, and apply the method to study educational attainment.

Title: Partial Identification of Binary Choice Models with Misreported Outcomes. (arXiv:2401.17137v1 [econ.EM])
Abstract: This paper provides partial identification of various binary choice models with misreported dependent variables. We propose two distinct approaches by exploiting different instrumental variables respectively. In the first approach, the instrument is assumed to only affect the true dependent variable but not misreporting probabilities. The second approach uses an instrument that influences misreporting probabilities monotonically while having no effect on the true dependent variable. Moreover, we derive identification results under additional restrictions on misreporting, including bounded/monotone misreporting probabilities. We use simulations to demonstrate the robust performance of our approaches, and apply the method to study educational attainment.
translated_title: 具有错误报告结果的二项选择模型的部分识别
translated_abstract: 本文对具有错误报告因变量的各种二项选择模型进行了部分识别。我们提出了两种不同的方法，分别通过利用不同的工具变量。在第一种方法中，工具被假设仅影响真实的因变量而不影响错误报告概率。第二种方法使用了一种在对错误报告概率产生单调影响的工具变量，而对真实的因变量没有影响。此外，我们还得出了对错误报告的额外限制条件下的识别结果，包括有界/单调错误报告概率。我们使用模拟来展示我们方法的鲁棒性表现，并将该方法应用于教育成就的研究。
tldr: 本文通过两种不同的方法对具有错误报告因变量的二项选择模型进行了部分识别，我们使用了不同的工具变量，在限制条件下进行了识别结果，并展示了方法的鲁棒性表现。
en_tdlr: This paper provides partial identification of various binary choice models with misreported dependent variables. Two distinct approaches are proposed, utilizing different instrumental variables. The identification results are derived under additional restrictions on misreporting, and the robust performance of the methods is demonstrated through simulations.
